Tomoka Reserve | City of Ormond Beach, FL - Official Website Skip to Main Content facebook Instagram Search Government Departments Economic Development Residents How Do I... Home Departments Planning / Zoning Development Projects Tomoka Reserve Tomoka Reserve Updates: *12/18/2023 Update: This application has withdrawn and no additional updates will be provided to this webpage. Please see https://www.ormondbeach.org/1036/Tomoka-Reserve-R-2-Zoning for updates to the zoning map amendment application under review. *11/22/2023 Update: The Tomoka Reserve project has withdrawn its application for the PRD Development Order for project PRD 2022-043. A request has been made to move forward with their zoning map amendment application from PRD, Planned Residential Development, to R-2, Single-Family Low Density. The letter is provided here . No date for a Planning Board meeting has been established and updates will be provided on the city's website. *11/03/2023 Update: The City Commission packet is available on the City's website at www.ormondbeach.org/agenda . *11/03/2023 Update: The City Commission audio link (during the meeting) is: https://youtube.com/live/4whfV-AGgPg?feature=share . *11/03/2023 Reminder: The City Commission meeting will be held at Calvary Christian Center, 1687 West Granada Boulevard and will start at 6:00 p.m. *10/04/2023 Update: The first reading of the Tomoka Reserve application for the issuance of the development order is scheduled for November 7, 2023 as part of the regular City Commission agenda. The meeting will be held at Calvary Christian Center, 1687 West Granada Boulevard and will start at 6p.m. There have been no project updates as of October 4, 2023. **09/22/2023 Update: Link for broadcast of September 26, 2023 Planning Board: https://youtube.com/live/QzTA4geTe_U?feature=share *09/14/2023 Update: Planning Board report for the September 26, 2023 Planning Board meeting is provided below. *09/07/2023 Update: Site plan submittal provided below. *09/07/2023 Update: Planning Board meeting to be held on September 26, 2023 at Calvary Christian Center at 1687 West Granada Boulevard, Ormond Beach, FL 32174, starting at 6:00 p.m. *08/17/2023 Update: There are three updates from the Planning Board continuation packet issued August 11, 2023. The first update (Attachment 16) which is additional correspondence from August 10, 2023 to August 16, 2023. The second update (Attachment 17) is additional information provided by the applicant. The third update (Attachment 18) is a staff PowerPoint detailing the applicant's responses to staff recommendations. The updates are provided below and on the Planning Board webpage located here . *08/17/2023 Update: City staff received additional information (Attachment 17) from the project team for the Tomoka Reserve project. This material is supplemental to the existing submittal and has not been reviewed by the Site Plan Review Committee. The Planning Board can act upon the original site plan presented at the July 13, 2023 meeting. CIty staff would advise the Planning Board that the additional information should be considered a material change. If there is a desire to alter the site plan presented on July 13, 2023 then an additional review by the Site Plan Review Committee (SPRC), public notice, and the opportunity for public comments. It is important to note that the August 21, 2023 Planning Board meeting has been advertised as a continuation of July 13, 2023 with no public/audience comments based upon where the July 13, 2023 meeting stopped. Any material change is required to occur with public notification and a new public hearing. **08/11/2023 Update: The August 21, 2023 Planning Board packet is available and located here . ** 08/02/2023 Update: The continuation of the July 13, 2023 Planning Board meeting shall occur on August 21, 2023 starting at 6:00 p.m. at Tomoka Christian Church, located at 1450 Hand Avenue . **08/02/2023 Update: The continuation of the July 13, 2023 Planning Board meeting was in the Board discussion portion of the meeting and this is where the August 21, 2023 meeting shall resume. The Planning Board may call upon city staff, the applicant and the Tomoka Oaks Homeowners' Association for any updates or questions during the Board discussion. Because the audience/public comments portion of the Planning Board meeting have concluded and been closed, there will not be comment cards available or the opportunity for public comments at the August 21, 2023 continuation meeting. **08/02/2023 Update: Link for recording of July 13, 2023 Planning meeting: https://youtube.com/live/ZtdFx0FIdq8?feature=share **07/03/2023 Update: The Planning Board packet is available and located here . **06/22/2023 Update: The Tomoka Reserve project has been scheduled for the July 13, 2023 Ormond Beach Planning Board meeting to be held at Calvary Christian Center at 1687 West Granada Boulevard, Ormond Beach, FL 32174, starting at 6:00 p.m. Additional information is provided below under the Planning Board section. **06/09/2023 Update: The Tomoka Reserve project is tentatively scheduled for July 13, 2023 Planning Board.¬† Written comments on the project for inclusion in the packet can be sent to comdev@ormondbeach.org - please include "For Planning Board" in subject line. **06/09/2023 Update: SPRC resubmittal for July 13, 2023 Planning Board received. **05/11/2023 Update: SPRC comments (3rd review issued). **04/12/2023 Update: Updated traffic impact analysis available under the Status section. **02/21/2023 Update: SPRC comments issued and provided below under Status section. **01/23/2023 Update: The Tomoka Reserve project requested a 90-day extension to their required site plan resubmittal from January 28, 2023 to April 28, 2023 which staff granted under Section 4-05 of the Land Development Code. **01/19/2023 Update: The neighborhood meeting notice for February 8, 2023 is available here . **01/19/2023 Update: The second submittal for the project is provided below.¬† The project's neighborhood meeting is required to occur prior to the second SPRC review comments. **12/15/2022 Update: The review of the Traffic Impact Analysis is available here . **12/15/2022 Update: The project has identified hazardous trees that require removal and the information is available here . **11/17/2022 Update: The project team requested a 90 day extension to respond to Site Plan Review Committee comments.¬† A resubmital (or an additional extension) is required on or before January 28, 2023. **9/21/2022 Update: A traffic impact analysis has been received by city staff and is available here . **8/8/2022 Update: A demolition application has been submitted and is under review for all structures associated with the former Tomoka Oaks golf course property.¬† Demolition permits are reviewed/issued/inspected by the city's Building Department. Status: Pre-application meeting: January 5, 2022. Submittal of site plan: April 13, 2022 (1st review), January 19, 2023 (2nd review), May 1, 2023 (3rd review), June 8, 2023 (4th review). Submittal of Planned Development amendment: April 13, 2022. Site Plan Review Committee (SPRC) review: May 3, 2022 (1st), February 21, 2023 (2nd review), May 11, 2023 (3rd review). June 28, 2023 (4th review), DUE September 13, 2023 (5th review) *06.28.2023, Request for additional information, SPRC comments - Tomoka Reserve *06.28.2023, Correspondence received during 4th review . * 05.11.2023, Request for additional information, SPRC comments - Tomoka Reserve. *05.11.2023, Correspondence received during 3rd review. * 05.05.2023, Traffic Impact Analysis comments. *02.21.2023, Request for additional information, SPRC comments - Tomoka Reserve *02.20.2023, Correspondence received from 01.19.2023 to 02.20.2023 *05.03.2022, Request for additional information, SPRC comments - Tomoka Reserve *05.03.2022, Correspondence received during 1st SPRC review September 26, 2023 Planning Board Information September 26, 2023 Planning Board Agenda Staff Report Outline Combined Staff Report Staff Report Attachment 1: Outstanding SPRC comments Attachment 2: Maps Attachment 3: Correspondence received Attachment 4: Traffic Information Attachment 5: Environmental Information Attachment 6: School Concurrency Attachment 7: Neighborhood Meeting summaries Attachment 8: Analysis of development ability Attachment 9: Applicant provided information Attachment 10: Site plan, September 6, 2023 Attachment 11: Planning Board minutes Attachment 12: PowerPoints Attachment 13: Older information that has been updated Site plan Submittal from September 6, 2023 Site plan submitted 09.06.2023 Documents from September 6, 2023 2023 09 06 Buffer Tree Planting Locations 2023 09 06 v2 Buffer Planting Maintenance Plan Project Narrative - PB Revision List Revised architectural standards for PB Additional Review Tomoka Oaks- Nova Rd. Beachside 0 Skip to Content About Menu Music & Events Gallery Our Venues Merchandise Contact Subscribe VIP Members Open Menu Close Menu About Menu Music & Events Gallery Our Venues Merchandise Contact Subscribe VIP Members Open Menu Close Menu About Menu Music & Events Gallery Our Venues Merchandise Contact Subscribe VIP Members Hello there! Welcome to Beachside, where good times, ocean breezes, and great food await! I‚Äôm Dee, your new owner! I‚Äôm thrilled to finally make my dream a reality and to bring a lively and laid-back atmosphere to Ormond Beach. We are family-owned and operated and passionate about serving up the freshest meals and creating the best experience in town. Come join us on the weekends for some dancing and indulge in our delicious meals featuring secret recipes you won't find anywhere else. Prepare yourself for a culinary adventure at our vibrant new venue, The Lounge at Beachside! Located downstairs, you can groove to live music or head upstairs to our deck for breathtaking ocean views and refreshing sea breezes. With mouthwatering dishes, a lively atmosphere, and memories waiting to be made, it's the perfect spot to unwind and enjoy the best of beach life! Join us and experience the fun‚Äîyour table is waiting! DINE, DANCE, REPEAT. now serving weekend brunch! now serving weekend brunch! now serving weekend brunch! ‚Äú Awesome family owned ...great food...fun music ....a must visit !!! Food: 5/5  |  Service: 5/5  |  Atmosphere: 5/5 ‚Äù ‚Äî Google Review ‚Äú First time here, best of the best! Great music and service ‚Äù ‚Äî Google Review ‚Äú Nice owners, very involved! Great bands, music starts early and it‚Äôs not too loud! Food: 5/5  |  Service: 5/5  |  Atmosphere: 5/5 ‚Äù ‚Äî Google Review ‚Äú Amazing evening ! Music, upbeat & fantastic food! We enjoyed the Ribeye and it was the best we‚Äôve had in Daytona Beach! Owners are super friendly and staff on top of things. What an awesome experience. Won‚Äôt be our last!! Food: 5/5  |  Service: 5/5  |  Atmosphere: 5/5 ‚Äù ‚Äî Google Review ‚Äú Love the atmosphere here. The food and drinks were wonderful. We had the opportunity to meet the owners. They were great as well. They recently took over ownership in September and they are doing a great job in the neighborhood. He must frequent this local and locally owned business. Live music all weekend and great food and drinks Wednesday through Sunday. Food: 5/5  |  Service: 5/5  |  Atmosphere: 5/5 ‚Äù ‚Äî Google Review ‚Äú So many good things to say: Soulfire band will keep you dancing and Rockin‚Äô. Our servers, being a foodie I have to brag on the food. Been here about five times and had five different food items and you will not be disappointed. Food: 5/5  |  Service: 5/5  |  Atmosphere: 5/5 ‚Äù ‚Äî Google Review ‚Äú Great food, great bands, great owners and staffs !!! Food: 5/5  |  Service: 5/5  |  Atmosphere: 5/5 ‚Äù ‚Äî Google Review ‚Äú Had a wonderful meal. The Ribeye is so awesome very friendly atmosphere and the band Soulfire was very entertaining. Best date night the wife and I have had in a very very long time would love to congratulate the owners Mike and Dee on a job well done keep up the awesome hard work your staff is very organized. Food: 5/5  |  Service: 5/5  |  Atmosphere: 5/5 ‚Äù ‚Äî Google Review ‚Äú My family came here in October and were very impressed with this place, so we decided to come back for NYE. I tell you the food is amazing, we‚Äôve had the Pork tacos, Chicken/pork skewers with rice, burgers, shrimp and oh so delicious feta fries. Real chef with great food not just bar food. The staff are always friendly and steady checking on us, Kiana and Ocean are super fun. The owners Dee and Mike are very gracious hosts and very awesome people. The downstairs lounge is so beautifully decorated and what a great view upstairs on the deck. They have a nice variety of entertainment with live music, open jam and just music playing on the house speakers. We come to Daytona from Georgia often and look forward to visiting them each time. We would definitely recommend coming here. Multi-Family Advisors | Beachside Partners Skip to content Home About Us About Us Our Services Current Offerings Sales Portfolio Sales Portfolio Deal Stories Contact Us Home About Us About Us Our Services Current Offerings Sales Portfolio Sales Portfolio Deal Stories Contact Us About Us At Beachside Partners, our approach is simple: treat every transaction with the care and commitment we‚Äôd give our own. We‚Äôre not just here to make a sale we‚Äôre here to be true advisors. Whether our clients are buying, selling, or planning for the future, we focus on what‚Äôs best for them not just what closes a deal. We own multifamily property ourselves, so we understand what it means to be on both sides of a transaction. That ownership mindset shapes how we work we bring clear guidance, strong analytics, and real-world experience to help our clients make smart, confident decisions. More than anything, we believe in building long-term relationships. Our clients trust us because we show up with honesty, transparency, and a commitment to doing things the right way even when it‚Äôs not the easy way. Jonathan Standring FOUNDER | DRE#01893163 | 805-689-1919 JON@BEACHSIDEPARTNERS.COM Jon Standring is the Founder and President of Beachside Partners, a Santa Barbara based real estate advisory firm specializing in multifamily real estate along California‚Äôs South Coast. Since obtaining his broker‚Äôs license in 2010, Jon has closed over $350 million in real estate transactions throughout California. After graduating from UCSB in 2008, Jon began his career at Orion Realty Group, a subsidiary of Fidelity National Financial, where he managed corporate leasing across the country. He later joined Radius Group, focusing on multifamily sales throughout Santa Barbara County. In 2015, he launched Beachside Partners to offer a more hands-on, advisory-first approach rooted in local expertise, transparency, and long-term relationships. ¬†Jon brings clarity and strategy to the table, making him a trusted resource for clients who want to explore every option before making informed, confident decisions. His passion for real estate goes beyond transactions. As President of the Coastal Housing Coalition, Jon is actively involved in advancing housing solutions that support Santa Barbara‚Äôs local workforce and protect the region‚Äôs long-term vitality. Through this role, he collaborates with public and private stakeholders to shape policy, raise awareness, and drive meaningful action around community based housing. Outside of work, Jon is a dedicated father who loves coaching his sons‚Äô youth sports and enjoying life in Santa Barbara with his wife, Lisa, and their three boys: James, Jacob, and Luke Riley. Contact Jon Nick Henry PARTNER¬† |¬† DRE#01748131 | 805-705-7311 NICK@BEACHSIDEPARTNERS.COM Nick Henry specializes in the sale of apartment buildings in Ventura & Santa Barbara Counties. Since 2008, Henry has closed 200 real estate transactions totaling over $275 million in sales. He has represented numerous investors, as well as multiple affordable housing agencies, in buying and selling both large and small multifamily investment properties. Mr. Henry owns multiple apartment buildings himself. Prior to practicing brokerage, Nick managed approximately 50 apartment buildings and homes at one of the largest property management companies in Santa Barbara. Mr. Henry is a graduate of the University of California, Santa Cruz. ¬†Outside of real estate Nick enjoys spending time with his wife and 3 boys and being as active as possible through mountain biking, surfing and coaching youth sports. Contact Nick Lori Zahn ASSOCIATE BROKER¬† |¬† DRE#01914851 | 805-451-2712 LORI@BEACHSIDEPARTNERS.COM Covering the tri-counties from Ventura through San Luis Obispo, Lori‚Äôs path has taken her from duplexes through $75M portfolio sales. Prior to joining Beachside Partners as an Associate Broker, Lori spent 11 years with Radius Commercial Real Estate and Investments where she played an integral role on a highly successful team specializing in multi-family sales. The immense diversity of her transactions makes navigating complexities her trademark/specialty. Owning a personal portfolio including multi-family, commercial and residential properties, along with her construction background, are the beginning of her skill set. She is determined to have transactions be seamless for her clients. Zahn integrates creativity, value-creation, determination and authenticity to the buyers and sellers she represents; serving them with excellence and integrity. As a California native, Lori has deep roots in Santa Barbara and regularly volunteers with many local non-profits. She and her husband own Sol Wave Water Inc, a water conditioning company, she is a Board Member for the Santa Barbara Rental Property Association, member of Santa Barbara Navy League, Honorary Plank Owner of the USS Santa Barbara, prior Co-Chair for Heart Walk & Executive Committee ‚ÄúGo For Red‚Äù ‚Äì American Heart Association, and active participant for SGI-USA ‚Äì Santa Barbara. Contact Lori Jason Liehr ASSOCIATE AGENT¬† |¬† DRE#02152826 | 805-406-6463 JASON@BEACHSIDEPARTNERS.COM Jason specializes in the sale of multi-family properties within the Santa Barbara and Ventura territories. Since 2021 Jason has closed over 50 commercial real estate transactions along the south coast. His deep understanding of the local markets and refined analytical acumen serve as the foundation for his ability to provide invaluable strategic advice to his clients. Jason has earned a reputation for building lasting relationships that are based off integrity and care. Prior to joining Beachside Partners, Jason worked for a local brokerage firm where he brokered a multitude of lease and sale transaction in the industrial, retail and office sector. This depth of knowledge across product types allows Jason to utilize customized strategies to navigate complex transactions and provide exceptional results. Jason has resided in Santa Barbara since 2010 and is a graduate from the University of California Santa Barbara. He currently lives in Goleta with his wife and one young daughter.
